question: You had an appointment with the bank and now you realized that you can't make it for that .write a letter to the manager-Give details about your appointment and dates.-Explain the reason why you cannot make it.-Ask for other dates.
text: I am writing this letter to inform you I am unable to make the appointment which I booked with your assistance three weeks ago regarding a private vehicle loan.
My appointment is on Monday 3rd December. As I have gotten my drivers license, I am planning to purchase my first car. I desperately need a consultant to help me design an economical loan plan.

I am incredibly sorry for being unable to go to your branch on that date. My manager told me our company senior executives are coming to our offices to discuss next year’s working strategy. I have been asked to make a presentation talking about my ideas, so I cannot be absent.

I reckon I will be free on 5th December, please let me know whether that day is suitable for you. I prefer to decide my loan plan and buy my car before Christmas as I would like to drive my car to do a road trip during the New year festival.
Once again, sorry for the inconvenience for you. I am waiting for your reply.
